name: Earthdive
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48

Play as a squirrel and skydive to the center of the earth! Collect acorns and power ups to boost your score! Travel through many procedurally generated layers!

Credits:

BuhPoi (this is my first game jam!)

Font: Pixeled by OmegaPC777 (https://www.dafont.com/pixeled.font)

Sounds made using SFXR
